title: Vicky Pattison denies she 'took up a valuable hospital bed' after falling ill with flu over Valentine's Day
text:
Vicky Pattison denies she 'took up a valuable hospital bed' after falling ill with flu over Valentine's Day The I'm A Celebrity winner spent Valentine's Day in hospital Share Get   Thank you for subscribing!   
Vicky Pattison has hit back at the accusation she took up a “valuable hospital bed” after falling ill with the flu. 
The former Geordie Shore star and I’m A Celebrity… Get Me Out Of Here! winner spent Valentine’s Day in hospital with boyfriend John Noble, after being struck down with the illness. 
John posted photos to Instagram showing Vicky lying on a hospital bed looking unwell, while she took to social media to apologise to him for “ruining” the most romantic day of the year. 
One fellow Twitter user remarked: “She took up a valuable hospital bed for the flu.” https://www.instagram.com/p/BQgcGqPFyKB/embed 
Vicky, however, responded, saying: “No, it wasn’t just the flu - not that it’s got anything to do with you - also, I wouldn’t take up the bed - I chose to go home.” 
The former Geordie Shore star had sparked concern among fans when she posted to Instagram that she’d spent the most romantic day of the year in hospital. 
She had written: “Happy Valentines to you all but most of all to my favourite human @johnnoblejn!!! I can't believe we're spending valentines in the hospital.. I'm so sorry but as long as I'm with you I am the happiest girl in the world! 
“Love you to the moon and back.” Vicky has been unwell this week Read More Vicky Pattison flaunts abs in crop top after furiously hitting back at claims she alters social media photos 
John, meanwhile, shared two images to his own Instagram showing Vicky lying in a hospital bed. He said: “Not the valentines we had planned but at least she got me ! I mean at least she's ok.” 
A rep for Vicky told Mirror Celebs that she has been suffering from a nasty flu and was in hospital for a blood test and antibiotics. 
“Vicky has been working really hard on her fitness for a month now but the flu has hit her pretty hard this week. She's in great shape but had to go to hospital today for a blood test and antibiotics to ensure she's fighting fit again,” said her spokesperson. It wasn't quite the Valentine's Day Vicky had planned (Photo: Getty) https://www.instagram.com/p/BQgVGP-jGeJ/embed 
After leaving hospital, Vicky returned to Instagram to share an image of a beautiful bunch of red roses, presumably a gift from John, and a Valentine’s Day card. 
She wrote: “He's looked after me all through the night and all day, never left my side... He's more than my boyfriend, he's my best friend and the only man who's ever made me feel safe and loved... @johnnoblejn! Sorry I ruined Valentine's Day baby... I love you.” 
Vicky and businessman John began dating last year; he accompanied her to Australia where she was working on I’m A Celebrity… Get Me Out Of Here!’s spinoff show, Extra Camp. Video Loading
